subject: College Athletics
Suits and Litigation
Discrimination
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: If the University of California, Berkeley, does not reinstate teams cut last fall, it could be forced to add 50 spots for women and eliminate 80 more spots for men.
snippet: If the University of California, Berkeley, does not reinstate teams cut last fall, it could be forced to add 50 spots for women and eliminate 80 more spots for men.
